objectives: Students will discuss health and fitness using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to health and fitness
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining health and fitness content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore health and fitness through a Science Fiction lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving health and fitness

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to health and fitness in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about health and fitness using formal register
Students create original scifi themed content about health and fitness in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe health and fitness in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in health and fitness?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about health and fitness?
How does health and fitness change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving health and fitness
roles: Character A: Using formal register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in formal register within scifi theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
